mapper.select: SELECT building_cd as cd, building_nm as cdNm FROM T_BUILDING WHERE workplace_id = 1 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id as cd, door_nm as cdNm FROM T_DOOR ORDER BY id ASC

SELECT TD.id AS id, TD.door_nm AS doorNm, TB.building_nm AS buildingNm, TF.floor_nm AS floorNm FROM T_DOOR TD LEFT OUTER JOIN T_BUILDING TB ON TD.building_id = TB.id LEFT OUTER JOIN T_FLOOR TF ON TD.floor_id = TF.id WHERE TD.id = #{doorId}

SELECT TM.id as id, TB.building_nm as buildingNm, TM.door_id as doorId, TF.floor_nm as floorNm, TD.door_nm as doorNm, TM.terminal_cd as terminalCd, TM.terminal_typ as terminalTyp, TM.model_nm as modelNm, TM.mgmt_num as mgmtNum, (SELECT cd_nm FROM T_CMMN_CD WHERE cd_typ = 'TerminalTyp' AND cd = TM.terminal_typ) AS terminalTypNm, TM.ip_addr as ipAddr, TM.complex_auth_typ as complexAuthTyp, (SELECT cd_nm FROM T_CMMN_CD WHERE cd_typ = 'ComplexAuthTyp' AND cd = TM.complex_auth_typ) AS complexAuthTypNm, TM.face_auth_typ as faceAuthTyp, (SELECT cd_nm FROM T_CMMN_CD WHERE cd_typ = 'FaceAuthTyp' AND cd = TM.face_auth_typ) AS faceAuthTypNm, (SELECT cd_nm FROM T_CMMN_CD WHERE cd_typ = 'OpModeTyp' AND cd = TM.face_auth_typ) AS opModeTypNm, TM.op_mode_typ as OpModeTyp, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_WB_LIST WHERE terminal_id = TM.id AND wb_typ = 'BLACK') AS blackListCnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_WB_LIST WHERE terminal_id = TM.id AND wb_typ = 'WHITE') AS whiteListCnt, DATE_FORMAT(TM.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS createdAt, TM.use_yn as useYn FROM T_TERMINAL TM LEFT OUTER JOIN T_DOOR TD ON TM.door_id = TD.id JOIN T_BUILDING TB ON TD.building_id = TB.id LEFT OUTER JOIN T_FLOOR TF ON TD.floor_id = TF.id WHERE TM.id = #{id}

SELECT TE.id AS id, TE.emp_cd AS empNo, TE.emp_nm AS empNm, TE.dept_nm AS deptNm, TE.belong_nm AS belongNm FROM T_WB_LIST TB JOIN T_EMP TE ON TB.emp_id = TE.id
WHERE TB.terminal_id = #{id} AND TB.wb_typ = 'BLACK'

SELECT TE.id AS id, TE.emp_cd AS empNo, TE.emp_nm AS empNm, TE.dept_nm AS deptNm, TE.belong_nm AS belongNm FROM T_WB_LIST TW JOIN T_EMP TE ON TW.emp_id = TE.id
WHERE TW.terminal_id = #{id} AND TW.wb_typ = 'WHITE'

SELECT TE.id AS id, TE.emp_cd AS empNo, TE.emp_nm AS empNm, TE.dept_nm AS deptNm, TE.belong_nm AS belongNm FROM T_EMP TE LEFT OUTER JOIN T_WB_LIST TB ON TE.id = TB.emp_id AND TB.wb_typ = #{wbTyp} AND TB.terminal_id = #{id} WHERE TB.id IS NULL
AND (TE.belong_nm like CONCAT('%',#{keyword1},'%') OR TE.dept_nm like CONCAT('%',#{keyword1},'%'))
AND (TE.emp_cd = #{keyword2} OR TE.emp_nm like CONCAT('%',#{keyword2},'%'))

SELECT TE.id AS id, TE.emp_cd AS empNo, TE.emp_nm AS empNm, TE.dept_nm AS deptNm, TE.belong_nm AS belongNm FROM T_EMP TE LEFT OUTER JOIN T_WB_LIST TB ON TE.id = TB.emp_id AND TB.wb_typ = #{wbTyp} AND TB.terminal_id = #{id} WHERE TB.id IS NOT NULL

SELECT TE.id AS id, TE.emp_cd AS empNo, TE.emp_nm AS empNm, TE.dept_nm AS deptNm, TE.belong_nm AS belongNm FROM T_EMP TE LEFT OUTER JOIN T_WB_LIST TB ON TE.id = TB.emp_id WHERE TB.id IS NULL
and (TE.belong_nm like CONCAT('%',#{keyword1},'%') or TE.dept_nm like CONCAT('%',#{keyword1},'%'))
and (TE.emp_cd = #{keyword2} or TE.emp_nm like CONCAT('%',#{keyword2},'%'))
